name: part_012
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performing "Deal with the devil" in a casino-themed bar setting.
Chloe interacts with the audience after her performance and prepares to transition to the next stage.
Chloe arrives at an underwater aquarium stage and gets hilariously slapped by a fish while trying to talk.
Chloe showcases the aquarium stage's features and prepares to sing the next song.
Chloe performs a cover of "Umi no Yuurei" (Spirits of the Sea) on the aquarium stage.

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで打って

subtitles.original: 欲しがるようじゃね　まだベイビー
subtitles.english: If you're still wanting more, you're still a baby

subtitles.original: 欲しがるようじゃね　まだベイビー
subtitles.english: If you're still wanting more, you're still a baby

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない　完遂させて　Aww...
subtitles.english: I won't lose to anyone, let me see it through, Aww...

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない　完遂させて
subtitles.english: I won't lose to anyone, let me see it through

subtitles.original: ふぅー！
subtitles.english: Whew!

subtitles.original: はぁ、はい、みんな！どうだったー！？
subtitles.english: Haa, okay, everyone! How was it!?

subtitles.original: 結構、頑張ってみたんだけど、どうどうどうどう？
subtitles.english: I worked pretty hard on it, so how was it, how was it, how was it, how was it?

subtitles.original: いや、かなりね、練習もたくさん頑張って、
subtitles.english: No, really, I practiced a lot,

subtitles.original: 練習も！本当ーにたくさん頑張って！来たので、
subtitles.english: Practice too! I really, really worked hard to get here,

subtitles.original: 上手くいけてたらいいなって思います。どう、良かった？
subtitles.english: So I hope it went well. How was it, was it good?

subtitles.original: あ、良かった？あー良かったー！マジで良かったー！
subtitles.english: Oh, it was good? Ah, thank goodness! I'm so glad!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 可愛かった？
subtitles.english: Was I cute?

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい？ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Splendid? Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ではでは、ライブはまだまだ続きます！
subtitles.english: Well then, the live is still going on!

subtitles.original: 今度は水族館で準備ができてるみたいだから、
subtitles.english: It seems like the aquarium is ready now,

subtitles.original: 移動しちゃうよー！
subtitles.english: So let's head over there!

subtitles.original: いいかなー？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: いくよー？
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: レッツ！ゴー！すいすいすいー！
subtitles.english: Let's! Go! Suisuisui!

subtitles.original: ふぅー。
subtitles.english: Whew.

subtitles.original: やっぱ水だよな。
subtitles.english: Water is the best, after all.

subtitles.original: やっぱシャチ...
subtitles.english: After all, for an orca...

subtitles.original: うわぁ！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: びっくりした！ねぇ！
subtitles.english: That scared me! Hey!

subtitles.original: ねぇ、誰これ打ったの？
subtitles.english: Hey, who threw this?

subtitles.original: いらない！
subtitles.english: I don't want it!

subtitles.original: もう帰れって！ガタガタガタ...
subtitles.english: Go home already! *shaking*

subtitles.original: ふぅ。
subtitles.english: Phew.

subtitles.original: おわいっ！うわぁー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Waaah!

subtitles.original: 帰って！沙花叉の出番！マジで！
subtitles.english: Go away! It's Sakamata's turn! Seriously!

subtitles.original: うわぁー！やっべ！
subtitles.english: Waaah! No way!

subtitles.original: 帰れー！お前！いらない！
subtitles.english: Go home! You! I don't want you here!

subtitles.original: おらおらおら！
subtitles.english: Take this, this, this!

subtitles.original: くっそ、お前...はぁ、くっそ...
subtitles.english: Damn you... haa, damn it...

subtitles.original: はーい、到着しました！水族館！
subtitles.english: Okay, we've arrived! The aquarium!

subtitles.original: 実はね、さっき言ってなかったんだけど、すごい仕掛けを用意してもらったんです！
subtitles.english: Actually, I didn't say earlier, but they've prepared a great gimmick for me!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！天井、ドカーン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! The ceiling, kaboom!

subtitles.original: うわぁー！すごーい！天井が閉じました！みんな、これで課金も怖くないねって...
subtitles.english: Whoa! Amazing! The ceiling has closed! Everyone, now we don't have to fear microtransactions anymore... wait...

subtitles.original: 全然関係ない...。てか天井じゃないんですけど、はい！
subtitles.english: That's completely unrelated... and it's not even the ceiling, but anyway!

subtitles.original: めっちゃいいでしょ？沙花叉の仮面の模様になってるんですよー！めちゃくちゃいいよね！
subtitles.english: Isn't it great? It's in the pattern of Sakamata's mask! It's so cool, right?

subtitles.original: そして、まだあるんですね。いくよー？
subtitles.english: And there's more. Here we go!

subtitles.original: せーの、だーん！
subtitles.english: One, two, bang!

subtitles.original: すんごーい！
subtitles.english: Incre-dible!

subtitles.original: すごーい！見て見て！
subtitles.english: Amazing! Look, look!

subtitles.original: 水族館の中に、みんな入り込んじゃった！めちゃくちゃいいよね！
subtitles.english: Everyone has entered inside the aquarium! It's so cool, right?

subtitles.original: このセットにもめちゃくちゃ合う曲を選んできました！
subtitles.english: I've chosen a song that fits this set perfectly!

subtitles.original: みんな、聴いてくれるかな？
subtitles.english: Will everyone listen to it?

subtitles.original: すごい？あ、良かった良かった！
subtitles.english: It's amazing? Oh, good, I'm glad!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、みんな聴いてほしいな。いくよ？
subtitles.english: Well then, I want everyone to hear it. Here we go.

subtitles.original: 歌います。「海の幽霊」。
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing. "Umi no Yuurei" (Spirits of the Sea).

subtitles.original: 明け放たれたこの部屋には　誰もいない
subtitles.english: In this room thrown wide open, there is no one

subtitles.original:
海の幽霊
作詞・作曲　米津玄師
subtitles.english:
Umi no Yuurei (Spirits of the Sea)
Lyrics and composition by Kenshi Yonezu

subtitles.original: 潮風の匂い　染み付いた
subtitles.english: The scent of the sea breeze has soaked in

subtitles.original: 椅子が一つ
subtitles.english: There is one chair
